name: Vocolocation
description:
Control a cute bat with nothing but your real-life voice! Vocolocation explores the concept of games that only require Vocal Input to play, pushing boundaries with the simultaneous use of multiple attributes of Vocal Input at once. Behold the power of the human voice!

⚠️ This is an early prototype, the game might not work for everyone :") ⚠️

Controls: Use the pitch of your voice to fly up and down, make a loud sound to turn golden spikes into coins!

Made for NUS BComp Dissertation (Final Year Project)
Topic: Exploring Vocal Input Applications in Video Games

FAQ:

  • The game doesn't pick up my voice! (or something else doesn't work)
    • Try setting up everything (headphones, quiet environment) and restart the app to recalibrate it.
  • "Windows cannot access the specified device, path, or file"
    • https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/-windows-cannot-access-the-specified-d...
  • It still doesn't work :(
    • If you know me personally feel free to contact me and I will try to resolve your issue! The game might not work for everyone as it is still being tested so I'm sorry in advance :" Thanks for trying anyways!
